title: PMS 2.0 445 - The Match Preview, Lane Johnson, Euros Chatter With Nigel Seeley, & Ariel Helwani
description: On today's show, Pat and the boys dive into The Match 4 between Tom Brady and Phil Mickelson and Aaron Rodgers and Bryson Dechambeau, and everything else in the sports world. Joining the program is Super Bowl Champion, 3x Pro Bowler, All-Pro, RT for the Philadelphia Eagles, Lane Johnson joins the show to chat about his current physique, what he's been doing in the offseason to get ready for camp, creating OL Masterminds and what the plan for this weekend with some of the top lineman in the NFL, and if he's the best fisherman in the NFL (17:35-33:07). Later, our pal from the UK, perhaps the best soccer better Europe, Nigel Seeley joins the program to chat about the Euros, if it's coming home for England, who he thinks will be in the final, his thoughts on Wimbledon, and much more (57:02-1:11:07). Later, Ariel Helwani joins the show to chat about what he's doing now that he's left ESPN, where we can find his stuff, his recent Montreal Canadiens fan hood, what he thinks about Conor McGregor's fight this weekend and much more (1:13:17-1:52:45). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
